attributes.action: Play the national anthem before all sporting events held in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The London Olympics has seen this countries national identity lifted to a new high. People have been drawn together and communities strengthend in their support of team GB. Let's use this as the beginning of a new sustainable pride in this once great nation.

Sport units people and shows everyone in the world how proud we are to be British, to that end let us play the National Anthem before all sporting event held in this country.
